name: ENEMIES 2
description:
Looks like you're not done here yet...
E2 comes at you as the cool 'big brother' sequel to ENEMIES with tons more polish and playability- and not even to mention you can drive a car and pull out NPC's chairs out from under them!

Starting at a dead-end job for an obscure paper company with no story relevance, you venture onto your next job as an employee at...you guessed it! Lollygag Labs. The one and only game development company with questionable ethics! Where you uncover a plot of spoilers, deviance, gore, dangerous chairs, and of course: enemies

ENEMIES 2 is a singleplayer first-person shooter and exploration game with exciting weapons, interactable characters, and plenty of new and interesting environments from offices to secret bases in a story-driven campaign where you try not to die from things ranging from glowing squares to being exterminated to getting eaten by giant mutated monsters!

Bringing on fantastic new voice talent and all that other good sh*t, ENEMIES 2 will truly have you falling backward in your gaming chair!
